title: Sudden disconnection only when playing League

replies.body:
Try turning off the router's firewall. I was experiencing the same issues and it solved it for me.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bsRH8Yhz-a-could-be-solution-for-those-who-frequently-dc

It seems like you're having issues specifically holding a connection to our game servers.  League requires a constant online connection so it may be easier to spot a network problem, at least to the game server.  

I'm not really sure that peer to peer will do anything, and was used for patching updates.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot towards a resolution.  Test it in a custom game and let me know the results!
